Package io.luliin.twoshopbackend.messaging

Class RabbitSender

java.lang.Object
io.luliin.twoshopbackend.messaging.RabbitSender
@Component public class RabbitSender extends Object
RabbitSender is a helper class designed to make subscriptions somewhat scalable. Use in services where subscriptions need to be emitted, by calling its methods to forward the ShoppingList's id, or a DeletedListResponse to the message broker using autowired RabbitTemplate and TopicExchange.
Author:
Julia Wigenstedt Date: 2022-01-12

    Method
    Description
    void
    publishCollaboratorInvitedMessage(UserPayload userPayload)
    Publishes a user payload to the message broker that will be consumed by the mail service, which will send the corresponding email to the app user.
    void

    Publishes a deleted list response to the message broker, making sure all instances of the application will receive and emit subscriptions.

  • Method Details

    • publishShoppingListSubscription

      public void publishShoppingListSubscription(ShoppingList shoppingList)
      Publishes a shopping list's id to the message broker, making sure all instances of the application will receive and emit subscriptions. Use RabbitListener to listen for messages.
      Parameters:
      shoppingList - The ShoppingList being modified

    • publishDeletedResponse

      public void publishDeletedResponse(DeletedListResponse deletedListResponse)
      Publishes a deleted list response to the message broker, making sure all instances of the application will receive and emit subscriptions. Use RabbitListener to listen for messages.
      Parameters:
      deletedListResponse - The payload created when deleting the shopping list

    • publishWelcomeMailMessage

      public void publishWelcomeMailMessage(UserPayload userPayload)
      Publishes a user payload to the message broker that will be consumed by the mail service, which will send the corresponding email to the app user.
      Parameters:
      userPayload - The user information to populate dynamic email template with.

    • publishPasswordMailMessage

      public void publishPasswordMailMessage(AppUser appUser)
      Publishes a user payload to the message broker that will be consumed by the mail service, which will send the corresponding email to the app user.
      Parameters:
      appUser - The user information to populate dynamic email template with.

    • publishCollaboratorInvitedMessage
